msItem.title: Vajracchedikā
msItem.q:
meyenāpramāṇena puṇyaskandhena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyaṃti • sarve te satvā mama a(ṃ)[sena]
bodhi dhārayiṣyanti • tat kasya heto • na hi śakyaṃ subhūte mayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ hī[nā]dhimu
ktikai śrotuṃ nātma○dṛṣṭikai • na satvadṛṣṭikai na jīvadṛṣṭikai na pudgaladṛṣṭikaiḥ śakya[ṃ] śrotu
ugrahetuṃ vā dhā○rayituṃ vā deśayituṃ vā • vācayituṃ vā pa[ry]āpu[n]itu vā
nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate • ○ api tu subhūte yatra pṛ[th]ivīprade[ś]e ayaṃ sūtrāntaḥ pra
[k]āśiṣyate pūjan[īyaḥ] sa pṛ[thivī]pra[d]eś[o] bhaviṣyati • sadevam[ān]u[ṣās]u
